page.title: 17FARMING:LAND USE
page.content: Much of the land in Chardstock is used for farming and grazing Freisan cattle Much of the land is rented but very few acres are owned,by the Farmers.Sheep graze on some of the land.In Parks down in the Kit valley it is mostly Woodland and is used for rough grazing.In the Summer the cattle farmers make hay and silage for feed in the Winter.Some corn for feed is grown.Some low lying Marshy land is damp and unuseable.Many of the hedges have been pulled down and the strip fields incorporated into larger fields.Small areas are used for housing & light Industry-food processing.Some old quarries are used for rubbish dumping.
